alert.note: Alert for Eastern Payette National Forest; Northern Boise National Forest; Southern Boise, Western Sawtooth NF, including the Camas Prairie (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 09 at 1:53PM MDT until September 12 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...HIGH HAINES OF 6 POSSIBLE ON SUNDAY... .High Haines could possibly develop over portions of the northern forests on Sunday as strong high pressure aloft moves into the region. The watch includes the eastern Payette, Boise, and western Sawtooth national forests. The watch does not include the Four Corners fire. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR HIGH HAINES FOR EASTERN PAYETTE NATIONAL FOREST...NORTHERN BOISE NATIONAL FOREST AND SOUTHERN BOISE NATIONAL FOREST/WESTERN SAWTOOTH NATIONAL FOREST...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 402...403 AND 421... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * HAINES...6.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Payette National Forest; Northern Boise National Forest; Southern Boise, Western Sawtooth NF, including the Camas Prairie
